name: Zukoix's Evolution
description:
Zukoix's Evolution is a small simulator where you watch a group of creatures thrive or DIE!!!! This isn't a game I just had the idea of making it and did in a couple hours.

How it works:

Creatures have an energy meter which is the basis for most of the game

Eating food gives the creature energy

If a creature's energy depletes they die

If a creatures energy reaches 20 they replicate

Duplicated creatures have a mutation to their speed which can make it go up or down

The faster the speed of the creature the more energy is needed to move
